subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The $50,000 fine for failure to cooperate with an N.F.L. investigation is less than 1 percent of Brett Favre’s $16 million salary and is less than some fines for helmet-to-helmet hits.
snippet: The $50,000 fine for failure to cooperate with an N.F.L. investigation is less than 1 percent of Brett Favre’s $16 million salary and is less than some fines for helmet-to-helmet hits.
